citeinfo.origin: New York State Department of Energy Conservation. Bureau of Air Quality Surveillance
citeinfo.title: Air Monitoring Stations, Adirondack Park, 2000

descript.purpose: This dataset shows the location of each ambient air quality monitoring station currently being operated by the Bureau of Air Quality Surveillance (BAQS), Division of Air Resources, New York State Department of Environmental Conservation.
descript.supplinf: The following information was taken from the Department of Energy Conservation (DEC) Master Habitat Databank GIS server. The dataset 'Air Monitoring Stations' was clipped in ArcView to the 10 mile buffer around the Adirondack Park. See the EC, publication "New York State Air Quality Report, Ambient Air Monitoring System"

status.progress: Complete Maintenance and Update Frequency: None Planned

idinfo.useconst: Data is to be used at the scale intended. Please acknowledge NYSDEC Agency as the source of the data.

cntinfo.cntorgp: NYSDEC Bureau of Air Quality Surveillance (BAQS), Division of Air Resources

metadata.spref: Projection and Map Units: NYTM in meters, NAD83 horizontal datum
metadata.eainfo: Detailed Description: Items (or Fields) in the Point Attribute Table ------------------------------------------------------------------------ REGION: The DEC region where the station is located. STATION: Identification number used by the BAQS for each location. STAT_NAME: Common name associated with station number. EPA_NUMBER: Identification number used by the federal EPA for each station. PM_2_5: Designates if station is used to manually measure fine particulate of 2.5 microns or less. Values are: Y = Station is used to measure null = Station is not used to measure PM_10: Designates if station is used to measure fine particulate of 10 microns or less. Values are: Y = Station is used to measure null= Station is not used to measure CPM_2_5: Designates if station is used to continuously measure fine particulate of 2.5 microns or less. Values are: Y = Station is used to measure null= Station is not used to measure SPEC: Designates if station is used to measure fine particulate of various size fractions. Values are: Y = Station is used to measure null= Station is not used to measure ACID_RAIN: Designates if station is used to collect acid deposition samples. Values are: Y = Station is used to collect null = Station is not used to collect LEAD: Designates if station is used to measure ambient lead particulate levels. Values are: Y = Station is used to measure null= Station is not used to measure ME_NM: Designates if station is used to measure methane versus non-methane ambient hydrocarbons associated with ozone formation. Values are: Y = Station is used to measure null= Station is not used to measure TOXICS: Designates if station is used to monitor for toxic air contaminants. Values are: Y = Station is used to monitor null= Station is not used to monitor PAMS: Designates if station is a Photochemical Air Quality Monitoring Station, monitoring certain ambient hydrocarbons associated with ozone formation. Values are: Y = Station is a Photochemical Air Quality Monitoring Station null = Station is not a Photochemical Air Quality Monitoring Station SO2: Designates if station is used to monitor for the gaseous air contaminant sulfur dioxide. Y = Station is used to monitor null= Station is not used to monitor OZONE: Designates if station is used to monitor for the gaseous air contaminant ozone. Y = Station is used to monitor null= Station is not used to monitor NO2: Designates if station is used to monitor for the gaseous air contaminant nitrogen dioxide. Y = Station is used to monitor null= Station is not used to monitor CO: Designates if station is used to monitor for the gaseous air contaminant carbon monoxide. Y = Station is used to monitor null= Station is not used to monitor MET: Designates if station is used to measure temperature, barometric pressure and relative humidity Y = Station is used to monitor null= Station is not used to monitor PRECIP: Designates if station is used to measure rainfall. Y = Station is used to monitor null= Station is not used to monitor WS/WD: Designates if station is used to measure wind speed and direction. Y = Station is used to monitor null= Station is not used to monitor
